title: "Portland debuts first AI radio disc jockey"
excerpt: "The first AI-generated radio DJ, \"AI Ashley,\" has launched in Portland. It's generated by RadioGPT and originates from the voice of a real disc jockey. NBC News' Noah Pransky talks to the content director and DJ at Live 95."
